pr_title: Add annotations test case to BIR spec

timeline.message: Use boolean value to write and read boolean constants

Update BIR spec with constant value info

This also cleans the ksy file with proper names and type tags
Add annotations and typedef test cases

timeline.bodyText: Is it ok to change this? We'll have to inform llvm team to change there code.
timeline.author: manuranga

replies.bodyText: We are writing boolean and reading on CP table for boolean values. So doing the same in other places also will be consistent which is why the above change. Also, it makes sense to write and read boolean values for boolean constants than writing byte (even though we are doing the same thing writing 1 or 0 byte effectively)
replies.author: Kishanthan
